Elementarium:Tar.NAME: Tar
Elementarium:Tar.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Weak. NL Exhaust.

Elementarium:StickyTar.NAME: Sticky Tar
Elementarium:StickyTar.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Remove one Sticky Tar from deck after winning an elite fight.

Elementarium:GildedForm.NAME: Gilded Form
Elementarium:GildedForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! elementarium:Plated Armor. NL Gain 20 Gold. NL Lose 1 Dexterity.

Elementarium:FireblessedBlade.NAME: Fire-blessed Blade
Elementarium:FireblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 1 Focus. NL Exhaust.

Elementarium:WindblessedBlade.NAME: Wind-blessed Blade
Elementarium:WindblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Gain !B! Block 2 times. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

Elementarium:EarthblessedBlade.NAME: Earth-blessed Blade
Elementarium:EarthblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! elementarium:Plated Armor. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL Exhaust.

Elementarium:IceblessedBlade.NAME: Ice-blessed Blade
Elementarium:IceblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Gain 1 elementarium:Buffer. NL Exhaust.

Elementarium:VoidblessedBlade.NAME: Void-blessed Blade
Elementarium:VoidblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Gain 1 elementarium:Blur. NL Exhaust.
